mapper.insert: insert into member_tb (member_id, member_pw, member_nickname, member_type) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickName}, #{memberType})
mapper.select: select member_id id, member_pw pw, member_nickname nickname, member_type memberType from member_tb where member_id=#{id}
